title: ShopSavvy Price Tracker Input
description: Scrape product data from Amazon and Mercado Libre Mexico including prices, images, and details.

source.title: Source
source.description: Which e-commerce store to scrape: amazon, mercadolibre, or all.

query.title: Search Query
query.description: The product search keyword (e.g. iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S24). Used to build search URLs.

productUrls.title: Product URLs
productUrls.description: Direct product page URLs to scrape. Used for price re-checks on already tracked products. If provided, query is ignored.

maxResults.title: Max Results Per Source
maxResults.description: Maximum number of products to return per source store.
